name: Maria Padilla & The Falling Sky
description:
Romping and Stomping: Classic arcade action with nostalgic graphics and music!

Test your might and see how HIGH your SCORE can go, or see if you can survive through the WHOLE GAME!

Leave your quarters at home, this one is FREE-PLAY.

CONTROLS:

AWSD  and Space Bar

*This game is currently in Active Development. There will be bugs and graphical issues, and the game is not yet complete. Please stand by for more updates*

Reach out to petea#5336 on Discord if you have any questions, feedback or comments!
